description: Easy homemade granola bars are the perfect breakfast to grab and go and make for a healthy after school snack.
name: Peanut Butter & Oat Granola Bars Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 175°C/155°C fan-forced. Spread oat and almonds out on a lined baking sheet and toast for 10 minutes, or until lightly golden.
Add the dates to a food processor and pulse to form a dough consistency, about 1 minute. Place in a large bowl with the toasted oats and almonds.

Place the maple syrup, peanut butter and vanilla in a small saucepan over a low heat and warm through for 2 minutes, stirring to form a smooth mix. Pour into the bowl with the dates, oats and almonds and mix well to form a dough.
Line a square baking tin with parchment paper, add the dough and press into the tin to form an even layer. Cover with parchment and freeze for 20 minutes.
Remove from the freezer and slice into 10 bars.
